title: matchbox labels
content:
Someone just sent me this link, some great stuff here.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/maraid/sets/72157594234429063/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045918/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/maraid/sets/72157594234429063/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/maraid/sets/72157594234429063/")

 [‹ Letragraphica](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045918/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37168 "Go to previous forum topic") [Best Prices for Adobe Type? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045918/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37205 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pattyfab

comments.content:
Restricted colours and restrictive technology – working within what was possible – proper design, thanks Patty.

Tim

Nice stuff, Patty! (The poster’s [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045918/http:/www.maraid.co.uk/blog/) has some nice material, too.)

I know of two books about matchbook covers:

[_Striking Images_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045918/http:/www.amazon.com/Striking-Images-Vintage-Matchbook-Cover/dp/0811851435/ref=sr_1_2/104-0871536-9538369?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1190111514&sr=1-2)

[_Matchbox Labels_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045918/http:/www.amazon.com/Matchbox-Labels-Elegant-Examples-World/dp/1552979784/ref=pd_bxgy_b_text_b/104-0871536-9538369?ie=UTF8&qid=1190111514&sr=1-2)

The company I worked for (Abbeville) also did a book called Close Cover Before Striking

[http://www.amazon.com/Close-Cover-Before-Striking-Recollectibles/dp/0896...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045918/http:/www.amazon.com/Close-Cover-Before-Striking-Recollectibles/dp/0896596958/ref=sr_1_1/103-5433806-5764602?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1190124186&sr=1-1 "http://www.amazon.com/Close-Cover-Before-Striking-Recollectibles/dp/0896596958/ref=sr\_1\_1/103-5433806-5764602?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1190124186&sr=1-1")

I love the lileks site. You can spend hours there. He is hilarious.
